subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|土|t1=earth|曾|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – things grow in the earth, to build from earth.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[increase]]; to [[expand]]
# to [[gain]]; to [[add]]
# 13th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "[[expansion]], [[growth]]" ([[𝌒]])
